transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.sort:
Click on the desired option to sort.
To see all the options, click on the arrow.

settings.title: Settings
settings.successUrl: Success url (for user redirect after payment)
settings.failUrl: Fail url (for user redirect after payment)

faq.title: FAQ
faq.modificationPaymentTitle: Modification of the payment page design
faq.modificationPaymentText: To change the design of the payment page the partner needs to upload the custom CSS file in his personal account. (https://indacoin.com/gw/partneradmin)
faq.partnerNotificationTitle: Partner notification about payment completion - Callback
faq.partnerNotificationText: After the payment confirmation, we will send you a callback to the address that has been designated in your personal account. (https://indacoin.com/gw/partneradmin)
faq.creationPaymentTitle: Creation of successful and failed payment pages on a partner platform
faq.creationPaymentText: The partner is capable to monitor the pages with successful and failed payments on his platform to where it will be redirected after the payment is processed. The links should be indicated in the personal account. (https://indacoin.com/gw/partneradmin)

validation.loginBanned: This login was banned for 1 hour

partner.name: Partner name:
partner.finalCommission: Final commission for the buyer - <1>{{ procent }}</1>

tooltips.userId: UserID -  customer id in a seller system (string).
tooltips.transactionId: Transaction id you got in createTransaction method, one this id can have many requests (card payment attempts)
tooltips.extraInfo: Info that added in createTransaction method by partner
tooltips.link: Link to transaction page in indacoin system
tooltips.blockchainHash: Hash of withdrawal transaction in blockchain
tooltips.verifyInfo: KYC info of client if asked
tooltips.extraStatus: Status of best card payment attempt
tooltips.status: Status of transaction, is choosing like the best from all requests
tooltips.requestId: Id of best card payment attempt, can have many 3ds attempts
